description:
Great place in an excellent location for you to drop your bags and enjoy the city! Return to a quiet, safe, clean and comfortable place in the middle of the Upper West Side. 2 blocks from the local/express train. 1-3 block from dozens of restaurants, shops, bars and Central Park.

Personal clothing in half the closet. Feel free to hang up what you need.
name: Clean & quiet studio in heart of Upper West Side
review: The apartment is nice even though it's small but to explore the city is perfect. It is also very quite so your sleep is good! There is no natural light and this can be a little bit disturbing...
